TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateContent extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作錄製和播放邏輯，範本會在與 XAML 讀取器和寫入器互動時，使用這個邏輯來延後內容。

span.span: Implements the record and playback logic that templates use for deferring content when they interact with XAML readers and writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會有任何公用 API 在.NET Framework 4.5 Beta。This class has no public API in .NET Framework 4.5 Beta. 它提供的屬性值。It provides a property value for . 其建構函式是內部。Its constructor is internal. 沒有具現化路徑，但卻很複雜。There is an instantiation pathway, but it is complex. 具現化範本會依賴，而這需要表示延遲的讀取器執行個體，和服務。Instantiating a template relies on , which requires a representing a deferred reader instance, and a service. 這兩個這些考量通常是只與那些不使用預設 XAML 的 WPF 處理行為，其中包含延後內容處理範本的一部分與其基礎結構，並不需要一般的 WPF 應用程式若要存取上述 Api 來撰寫。Both these considerations are typically only relevant to those that are not using the default XAML for WPF processing behavior, which includes deferred content processing of templates as part of its infrastructure, and does not require the typical WPF application author to access the aforementioned APIs.
